resources.string: Already have an account? Log In
Password must be at least 8 characters!

Wellcome to NFTOK. This is an application that can be used for buying and selling NFT. In this application you can upload and sell your own NFT work, or you can buy other people work and the NFT becomes your property

string-array.name: berita
string-array.item: Biden administration extends immigration relief to Ukrainians in the US
President of Georgia on Ukraine crisis: It looks like Putin is destroying the "whole country"
US military establishes communications line with Russia to avoid any incidents near Ukraine

string-array.name: isi
string-array.item: The relief – known as Temporary Protected Status, or TPS – applies to people who would face extreme hardship if they were forced to return to homelands devastated by armed conflict or natural disasters.
He was not planning on the way Ukraine is resisting. He had a mass assault that was very psychological with his forces that were used from all sides. And it has not worked.

The US and Russia have established communications channel where the two sides can notify each other of any potential operations that may be in close proximity to avoid any possible miscalculations near Ukraine.
